ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <7> 67mm UV Filter +
<8> 58mm UV Filter + <9> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <10> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <11> Xit 12" Flexible Tripod +
<12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM & EF 70-300mm IS Lens + 64GB Card + Sling Bag + Flash + Battery & Charger + Tripod Kit
